summary: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.
cast: Bryce Dallas Howard|Robert Redford|Oakes Fegley|Oona Laurence|Wes Bentley|Karl Urban|Isiah Whitlock Jr.|Marcus Henderson|Aaron Jackson|Phil Grieve|Steve Barr|Keagan Carr Fransch|Jade Valour|Augustine Frizzell|Francis Biggs|Jasper Putt|Esmée Myers|Gareth Reeves|Levi Alexander|Jim McLarty|Brandie Stephens|Josephine Stephens|Tai McKenzie|Ian Harcourt|Mia Thomas|Ruby Acevedo|Oliver Neil|James Allcock|Annabelle Malaika Süess|Olly Presling|Jenesis Au-Yeung|Daria Ponomaryova|Bukhosi Ngewenya|William J. title: Peter y el dragón
